item.description:
4/12: Preview screening & Q&A w/Richard Gage, Architects & Engineers for 9/11 Truth.org - Cambridge
9/11: Explosive Evidence – Experts Speak Out
Local pre-screening w Richard Gage of Architects & Engineers for 9/11 Truth
Richard Gage, AIA, is coming to Cambridge to host one last private pre-screening before the official release of "9/11: Explosive Evidence - Experts Speak Out." We will be looking for additional feedback on this powerful, long-awaited documentary, which includes interviews with more than 50 experts in relevant fields.
PLEASE BRING 9/11 NEWCOMERS. Their feedback is crucial!

Limited seating; you must call or e-mail Rich McCampbell to announce your intention to attend (see below).

Suggested donation: $10 - for which you will be given a discount code good for $10 off the new DVD.


Experts Speak Out Pre-Screening
Snacks will be provided free of charge!

Date/Time

Thursday, April 12
Doors open at 6:30 PM, film begins at 7:00 PM,
Q&A to follow

Location

UPandOUT Community Center
243 Broadway
Cambridge, MA 02139
At the corner of Windsor and Broadway – entrance on Windsor.
Google Map
Equidistant from MIT and Central Sq T-stops.
http://rule19.org/videos/
RSVP


Call or e-mail Rich McCampbell to announce your intention to attend. Let him know how many will be in your party. We will maintain a waiting list in case of cancellations:

Rich McCampbell 857-998-8807 / 617-696-7606 / rich.mccampbell@crbusa.com

Thanks so much for your continued support!
Rich McCampbell, Richard Gage AIA, Architect and the AE911Truth volunteers

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 4/12 (LIMITED Please Read)- Screening & Q&A -Richard Gage AE911Truth.org
